abstract: Three boys are arrested in sexual assault of 12-year-old girl at Brooklyn school building; episode is likely to inflame debate over safety in New York’s schools.
lead_paragraph: During the Oct. 6 attack, the police said, the boys pulled down the girl’s pants and touched her.
snippet: During the Oct. 6 attack, the police said, the boys pulled down the girl’s pants and touched her....

headline.main: Police Arrest Three Boys in Sexual Assault at a Brooklyn School
headline.print_headline: Three Boys Are Arrested in Sex Attack at a School
